title: Implement MFA for Admin Access
subtitle: Enhance security for critical systems
description: Configure multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all administrative accounts across production and development environments. Ensure compatibility with existing SSO solutions.

title: Conduct Penetration Testing
subtitle: Identify vulnerabilities in web application
description: Schedule and execute a comprehensive penetration test on the main web application. Prioritize OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities and generate a detailed report with remediation steps.

title: Update Firewall Rules
subtitle: Restrict unauthorized network access
description: Review and update firewall rules to block known malicious IP addresses and restrict access to sensitive ports. Implement a change management process for all firewall modifications.

title: Develop Security Awareness Training
subtitle: Educate employees on phishing and social engineering
description: Create and deploy an interactive security awareness training module for all employees. Focus on recognizing phishing attempts, social engineering tactics, and data handling best practices.
